title: Cops: Did TV actress try to recruit Harry Potter star Emma Watson into sex slave cult?
itunes:title: Cops: Did TV actress try to recruit Harry Potter star Emma Watson into sex slave cult?
description:
Actress Allison Mack allegedly recruiting unsuspecting women to be a cult leader's sex slaves, according to federal prosecutors. Nancy Grace explores the dark, bizarre world of Keith Raniere and his cult-like organization. Her expert guests include former NXIVM publicist Frank Parlato, Seattle lawyer Anne Bremner, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, New York psychologist Caryn Stark and RadarOnline reporter Alexis Tereszcuk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
